contents.text: Welcome to Zedo in San Francisco, your partner for premium high-impact advertising with ZINC.
For information on our high-impact ZINC ad formats and sales inquiries, press 1.
For new client onboarding and package setup, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our client onboarding team.

navigationGoals: Set up my new ZINC advertising package and get started immediately
I’m a veteran-run startup and want help getting set up with my first ZINC advertising package.
I need guidance on integrating the ZINC API and configuring my new ad package.
I’m not very good with this; please help me set up my new advertising package.
I want to onboard a new ZINC ad campaign to promote our university physics seminar series.

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to the billing department.

navigationGoals: Review and correct a recent invoice and update my payment method
I need to check my billing statement and update my payment info for my ad account.
I need to download my latest billing CSV and update my payment method for my Zedo account.
I don’t understand my latest bill; could you help explain the charges?
I need help resolving a billing discrepancy on my ZINC advertising account invoice.

contents.text: For technical support and campaign assistance, press 2.
For technical implementation and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support specialists.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot integration errors with my ZINC ad implementation
My ad integration isn’t working; I need technical support to troubleshoot the implementation.
I need assistance troubleshooting our header-bidding tags and resolving ad load errors.
I’m having trouble installing the ad code on my site; can you guide me through it?
I’m having trouble integrating the ZINC ad code into our lab’s website and need technical implementation assistance.

contents.text: For campaign performance reports and analytics support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our campaign reporting team.

navigationGoals: Obtain detailed performance analytics for my active campaign
I need a performance report and analytics breakdown for my current campaign.
I need to pull campaign analytics, export CTR and impression metrics, and set up automated dashboards.
I’d like help reviewing my campaign results; I’m not sure how to read the report.
I’d like to obtain detailed performance analytics for my latest ZINC ad campaign.
